title: Rational molecular design of electrolyte additive endows stable cycling performance of cobalt-free 5 V-class lithium metal batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE03280B, Paper
Wen-hui Hou, Yu Ou, Tianyou Zeng, Qingqing Feng, Qingbin Cao, Pan Zhou, Yingchun Xia, Xuan Song, Weili Zhang, Yang Lu, Shuaishuai Yan, Hang-yu Zhou, Haiyu Zhou, Hao Liu, Fengxiang Liu, Kai Liu
We rationally designed a semi-fluorinated sulfone electrolyte additive, i.e. 2,2-difluoroethyl methyl sulfone (FS), which can meet the harsh demand for Li/LNMO 5V class lithium metal batteries.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
